title: Jane the Astronaut: The Mystery of the Alien Dragons
description: 1 Girl Astronaut + 1 Secret Door + 7 Alien Dragons = A Grand Adventure for early chapter book readers!Jane's first trip to the international space station is filled with strange disappearing door suspended in mid-airA hidden world filled with wonderand... seven baby dragon-like creatures in need of help. Can she protect her delightful discovery from falling into the wrong hands? Jane the Mystery of the Alien Dragons, is the first book in the series. This beautifully illustrated tale is perfect for girls ages 8-12 who love adventure and fun. Kids will learn a little about space and botany and will fall in love with the multi-colored dragons.Grab your copy now and let the space adventure begin!
author: Dianne Bateman
